mapper.select: /* 회원별 회원 정보 조회*/ SELECT m.member_id ,m.member_name ,m.member_level ,m.member_pw ,m.member_nickname ,m.member_post_num ,m.member_addr ,m.member_detail_addr ,m.member_phone ,m.member_birth ,m.member_email ,m.member_point ,m.member_date FROM member AS m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId};
/* 회원 아이디 중복 체크 */ SELECT IF(COUNT(1) = 1, 0, 1) FROM member AS m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId};
